title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

An internal website for a major stockbrokering house has this link at the top “TODAY'S BUSINESS: actionable sales items”. [Submitted by David Smith of Northridge, California, who comments “And stockbrokers wonder why the public is suspicious...”]
